channel.title: MYSQL errors
channel.description:
okay im trying to access my xat/xat.php file on my localhost so i can register on my htdocs ixat (which will be a test always) but it gives me this error
[code]Object not found!
The requested URL was not found on this server. If you entered the URL manually please check your spelling and try again.
If you think this is a server error, please contact the webmaster.
Error 404
localhost 7/8/2012 2:07:37 PM Apache/2.2.17 (Win32) mod_ssl/2.2.17 OpenSSL/0.9.8o PHP/5.3.4 mod_perl/2.0.4 Perl/v5.10.1[/code]

item.title: MYSQL errors
item.dc:creator: @deathschaos9 DeathsChaos9
item.description:
@deathschaos9 wrote:

If everything was right it wouldn’t be displaying the 404 error. Htdocs is is your root folder, so the path should be /htdocs/xat/xat.php.

Read full topic

item.title: MYSQL errors
item.dc:creator: @DJshawn1995 DJshawn1995
item.description:
@DJshawn1995 wrote:

hey i typed everything right and the same thing comes up

Read full topic

item.title: MYSQL errors
item.dc:creator: @deathschaos9 DeathsChaos9
item.description:
@deathschaos9 wrote:

That’s not a MySQL error that’s a 404 error, meaning xat/xat.php doesn’t exist and/or you typed the URL wrong.

Read full topic
